vote.text: Amendment SA 6628 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 6628 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Manchin. (consideration: CR S10104; text: CR S10104) To amend the title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6628 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Manchin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6628 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
